display_long_description:
Download now and explore VAIL’s free-to-play Citadel, engage in high-intensity 5v5 battles on four new free-to-play maps, and unlock VAIL Combat to discover why VAIL is the highest rated VR Shooter.

[media]

#  **TRAINING GROUNDS (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Engage in non-stop action on four free-to-play maps designed to improve skill with weapon pickups and loadout modifiers.

[media]

#  **SOCIAL HUB (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Challenge others to intense 1v1 battles, get the best score in mini-golf, and unlock VAIL Combat or other rewards by extracting ORE shards from the quarry.

[media]

#  **VAIL COMBAT (DLC)**
Gain full access to VAIL's complete experience. Dominate in popular team-based and free-for-all game modes as you level up, unlock rewards, and top the leaderboards.

[media]

# **CRITICALLY ACCLAIMED**

[media]

#  **TRAINING GROUNDS (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Engage in non-stop action on four free-to-play maps designed to improve skill with weapon pickups and loadout modifiers.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473393687_512109028220024_8255635767100546886_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=d-jJXma5wogQ7kNvwHhzHD9&_nc_oc=AdmmC-xfUaUv5_RI7xCylu1LcMgZoHdENwcUxW6fRimMfGu7VHYyzy_uwa6Zgt07VA4&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=tWrChXTPnPx6JHdGrHtqhQ&oh=00_AfJdofqPLi0FKboaLRzMbTZtlk_JWwoByAbMGUZwXU185A&oe=683D84F6)

#  **SOCIAL HUB (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Challenge others to intense 1v1 battles, get the best score in mini-golf, and unlock VAIL Combat or other rewards by extracting ORE shards from the quarry.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473393292_972139874890841_7067035628286260950_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=p0RO0RlHfPcQ7kNvwHDUPKp&_nc_oc=AdkW-vTHTN-W0sJw-ELZdvhp9T79R2dVbDiepJ_i9nISlYR94rilU3U-KV__qtAb5C4&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=tWrChXTPnPx6JHdGrHtqhQ&oh=00_AfJVhZw5c8fj0uiXymKZOCVNqbmp_oqDmNX4G6ragP3GjA&oe=683D96A9)

#  **VAIL COMBAT (DLC)**
Gain full access to VAIL's complete experience. Dominate in popular team-based and free-for-all game modes as you level up, unlock rewards, and top the leaderboards.
